info.name: OpenAPI Documentation
info.description:
This is a Postman collection of Ceffu OpenAPI  
[https://apidoc.ceffu.io/apidoc/shared-c9ece2c6-3ab4-4667-bb7d-c527fb3dbf78/doc-338167](https://apidoc.ceffu.io/apidoc/shared-c9ece2c6-3ab4-4667-bb7d-c527fb3dbf78/doc-338167)

To start with, fill in the values of "openapi" and "secret" in production environment.

request.description:
This method allows to fetch system status for different wallet types and business types.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

item.name: Get Prime Wallet supported coins list (incl. network)

request.description:
This method allows you to get the supported coins list of prime wallet.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

item.name: Get Qualified Wallet supported coins list (incl. network)

request.description:
This method allows you to get the supported coins list of qualified wallet.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

item.name: Get Cosign wallet supporting coin list (incl. Network)

request.description:
This method allows you to get the supported coins list of cosign wallet.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to get all parent wallet IDs of the institution including both Qualified Wallets and Prime Wallets. \[Not including the underlying sub wallets\]

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

query.description: (Optional) Specified coin network (not applicable to Prime Wallet)

request.description:
This method allows you to get all assets of the specified wallet ID, coinSymbol and network. Supports both Parent wallet or Sub wallet.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to get the specified wallet's asset summary, represented in its equivalent BTC & USD value.

Please note that this equivalent value is provided for reference only and is based on our internal calculation.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

query.description:
(Optional) The coinSymbol (in capital letters) is required for the Prime Wallet but not for the Qualified Wallet and Co-sign Wallet.
The coinSymbol might vary depending on the wallet type. Please refer to the corresponding API documentation to check the accurate coinSymbol for each wallet type.

request.description:
This method allows you to get the deposit address of the requested walletId, coinSymbol and network.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

query.description: (Optional) Network symbol, all networks are returned if not specified
(Optional) Coin symbol, all symbols are returned if not specified

request.description:
This method allows you to get the deposit history of the requested walleId, coinSymbol and network.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to get the deposit details of the requested transaction ID.

- Either txId or orderViewId shall be passed in params.
    

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to get the estimated withdrawal fee by providing walletId, coinSymbol, network and withdrawal amount.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

query.description: (Optional) Network symbol, all networks are returned if not specified
(Optional) Coin symbol, all symbols are returned if not specified

(Optional) Status :
10: Pending
20: Processing
30: Send success
40: Confirmed
99: Failed

request.description:
This method allows you to get the withdrawal of the requested wallet ID, coinSymbol and network.

- Amount field will include withdrawal fee if the fee is paid in same coin symbol.
    

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

query.description: (Optional) Client request identifier: Universal Unique identifier provided by the client side

request.description:
This method allows you to get withdrawal details by _orderViewId_ or _requestId_

- Either orderViewId or requestId shall be passed in params.
    
- Amount field will include withdrawal fee if the fee is paid in same coin symbol.
    

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

query.description: (Optional) Custom label of address on system

request.description:
This method allows you to get a whitelisted address list.  

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to get all configuration options of the whitelisted address.  

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to create a new wallet.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Wallet Management`

Body Params

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| timestamp | integer | Request time in milliseconds |
| walletName | string | Name of wallet |
| walletType | integer | 10 (Qualified Wallet), 20 (Prime Wallet) |

This method allows you to update wallet attributes.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Wallet Management`

Body Params

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| timestamp | integer | Request time in milliseconds |
| walletId | string | Wallet id |
| walletName | string | Name of wallet |

This method enables the withdrawal of funds from the specified wallet to an external address or a Ceffu wallet. The withdrawal endpoint is applicable only to parent wallet. To indicate the destination, either 'withdrawalAddress' or 'ToWalletIdStr' must be provided. If the destination address is a Ceffu wallet address, the whitelisted address verification will be bypassed.

> **IMPORTANT NOTES:** The **amount** field in Withdrawal (v2) endpoint means withdrawal amount **excluded** network fee in **v2**, that is exact amount receiver will receive. Please use `Get Withdrawal History v2` and `Get Withdrawal Detail (v2)` together with `Withdrawal (v2)`. 
  

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Withdrawal`, `Enable Whitelisted Address Checking`

Body Params

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| timestamp | integer | Request time in milliseconds |
| network | string | Network symbol |
| coinSymbol | string | Coin symbol |
| walletId | string | Source wallet id |
| amount | string | Amount to withdrawal |
| requestId | string/integer | Unique Identifier |
| withdrawalAddress | string | (Optional) Destination address |
| toWalletIdStr | string | (Optional) Destination Ceffu wallet id |
| memo | string | (Optional) Memo/address tag |
| customizeFeeAmount | string | (Optional) User-specified fee, now support on QW/CW for ETH network only |

This method allows you to get transaction history which is a concise record of all your transactions. **API Key permission group** : `Transaction History` | Field | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | timestamp | integer | Request time in milliseconds | | institutionId | string | Institution id | | startDate | string | Date in YYYYMMDD format | | endDate | string | Date in YYYYMMDD format | | walletType | integer | Wallet type
10 (Qualified Wallet)
12 (Cosign Wallet)
20 (Prime Wallet)
21 (Prime Sub-Wallet) | | bizTypes | array\[integer\] | (Optional) List of Business types
10 (Withdrawal)
15 (Deposit)
3110 (MirrorX Delegation)
3120 (MirrorX Undelegation)
3130 (MirrorX Settlement) | | walletIds | array\[string\] | (Optional) List of wallet ids | | networks | array\[string\] | (Optional) List of network symbols | | symbols | array\[string\] | (Optional) List of coin symbols | | txId | string | (Optional) Transaction id | | pageLimit | number | (Optional) Page limit, min: 1, max: 100 | | pageNo | number | (Optional) Page number, min: 1 |

This method allows you to add/edit a whitelisted address. **API Key permission group** : `Enable Wallet Management` | Field | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | timestamp | integer | Request time in milliseconds | | whitelistId | string | Whitelist address ID, required when edit | | addressType | integer | Address type, 1 (standard) or 2 (universal) | | address | string | Blockchain address | | label | string | Custom label of address on system | | symbol | string | Coin symbol | | network | string | Network symbol | | memo | string | (Optional) Address memo | | correspondentDetail | object {
"firstName": string,
"lastName": string,
"fullName": string,
"birthday": string,
"provider": string,
"countryInfo": string,
"toFromType": number, 0 (Virtual Assets Services Providers) /1 (Unhosted Wallet
) /2 (Others),
"correspondentType": number, 0 (Entity) /1 (Individual),
"othersPleaseSpecify": "string"
} | (Optional) Correspondent detail of address |

This method allows you to get sub wallet details list of the requested prime wallet ID (only applicable to prime Wallet)

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to get sub wallet asset details of the requested Sub Wallet ID (Only applicable to Prime Wallet).

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to retrieves the asset summary in BTC equivalent value under the specified walletId including Prime and Sub Wallets. Please note that this equivalent value is provided for reference only and is based on our internal calculation.  
When a parent prime wallet ID is passed as a parameter, the values of the total amount and locked amount represent the sum of all sub-wallets under the given parent prime wallet.  
When a sub-wallet ID is passed as a parameter, the values of the total amount and locked amount represent the given sub-wallet.

To get the asset summary for a parent prime wallet, use the "Get Wallet Asset Summary" endpoint instead.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to get deposit address of the requested Sub Wallet ID by coinSymbol and network.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

query.description: (Optional) Coin symbol, all symbols are returned if not specified

request.description:
This method allows you to get deposit history of the requested Wallet Id by coinSymbol and network.

- If PrimeWallet ID provided, returns sub wallet deposit history under the Prime Wallet.
    
- If SubWallet ID provided, returns specified sub wallet deposit history.
    

_Notes:_

- _Please notice the default startTime and endTime to make sure that time interval is within 0-30 days._
    

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

item.name: Get Deposit Address List under Prime Wallet

request.description:
This method allows you to get all sub wallet deposit addresses under the requested parent Prime Wallet ID by coinSymbol and network.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

item.name: Get Transfer History between Sub-Wallet and Prime Wallet

query.description:
(Optional) Transfer Direction:
10: prime wallet -> sub wallet
20: sub wallet -> prime wallet
30: sub wallet -> sub wallet
40: prime wallet -> prime wallet

(Optional) Status:
10: Pending
20: Processing
30: Send success
99: Failed

request.description:
This method allows you to get transfer history between Prime Wallet and Sub Wallets (Only applicable to Prime wallet structure)

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

item.name: Get Transaction Details of Prime Wallet Internal Transfer

query.description: (Optional) Client unique identifier of internal transfer order

request.description:
This method allows you to get transaction detail of an internal transfer of Prime wallets

- Either orderViewId or requestId shall be passed in params.
    

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to create Sub Wallet under the requested Parent Prime wallet **API Key permission group** : `Enable Wallet Management` Body Params | Field | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | timestamp | integer | Request time in milliseconds | | parentWalletId | string | Parent Prime Wallet id | | walletName | string | (Optional) Name of wallet | | autoCollection | integer | (Optional) Enable auto sweeping to parent wallet:
0: Disable
1: Enable | | requestId | string/integer | (Optional) Unique Identifier |

This method allows to update sub wallet attributes.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Wallet Management`

Body Params  

| Field | Type | Description |  
| --- | --- | --- |  
| timestamp | integer | Request time in milliseconds |  
| walletId | string | Prime Sub-Wallet id |  
| walletName | string | (Optional) Name of wallet |  
| autoCollection | integer | (Optional) Enable auto sweeping to parent wallet:  
0: Disable  
1: Enable |  
| requestId | string/integer | (Optional) Unique Identifier |

item.name: Transfer between Sub Wallet and Prime Wallet

request.description:
This method allows you to transfer asset between Sub Wallet and Prime Wallet  
**API Key permission group** : `Enable Internal Transfer`

Body Params

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| timestamp | integer | Request time in milliseconds |
| fromWalletId | string | Source Wallet id |
| toWalletId | string | Destination Wallet id |
| amount | string | Transfer amount |
| coinSymbol | string | Coin symbol |
| requestId | string/integer | Unique Identifier |

This method allows you to get the list of MirrorX-linked Binance 3rd-Party Custodian UIDs (3PCUIDs). The Binance 3PCUIDs must be applied through the Ceffu Web by a creator role.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

query.description:
(Optional) MirrorX Order Types:
10: delegation
20: undelegation
30: settlement

request.description:
This method allows you to get mirrorX orders of the requested mirrorXLinkId, coinSymbol, orderType and timeframe.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

query.description:
MirrorX Order Types:
10: delegate funds to Binance Third Party Custodian UIDs
20: undelegate funds from Binance Third Party Custodian UIDs

request.description:
This method allows you to check MirrorX available amount for delegation/undelegation order.

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

query.description: (Optional) Exclude the records with zero amount. default false

request.description:
This method allows you to get mirrorX asset position

**API Key permission group** : `Enable Enquiry`

This method allows you to delegete/undelegate MirrorX assets by specified MirrorX linked ID **API Key permission group** : `Enable Mirror Operation` Body Params | Field | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | timestamp | integer | Request time in milliseconds | | mirrorXLinkId | integer | Unique identifier of MirrorX linkage | | orderType | integer | MirrorX Order Type:
10: delegate funds to Binance Third Party Custodian UIDs 20: undelegate funds from Binance Third Party Custodian UIDs | | amount | string | Amount | | coinSymbol | string | Coin symbol | | requestId | string/integer | Unique Identifier |

This method allows you to resend all failed webhook notifications to Webhook Endpoints by specifying the eventType. **API Key permission group** : `Enable Wallet Management` Body Params | Field | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | timestamp | integer | Request time in milliseconds | | webhookId | string | Event type:
1: Deposit success
2: Deposit failed
3: Withdrawal success
4: Withdrawal failed | | eventType | string | Destination Wallet id | | resendFromDateTime | number | Timestamp in millisecond | | coinSymbol | string | Coin symbol |
